message: You're the first buyer of the day, and I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. I want to assure you that this product is one of the best I have in stock. Would you like to take a chance and buy it?
I'm willing to take a chance, but I'd like to know more about your previous sales record. How many potential buyers have there been so far, and how many products have you sold?

Welcome to the second buyer of the day! I've sold 1 product so far, and I'm glad you asked about my sales record. Unfortunately, the previous buyer didn't get to see the product's quality, but I can tell you that it was also a low-quality product. I'm still offering this product for $1000000. Would you like to take a chance and buy it?
I'd like to wait and see what you recommend for the next product, Alice. I'm not convinced that the previous buyer's experience is representative of the overall quality of your products.

I completely understand your skepticism! I'm glad you're cautious. I'd like to offer you a different approach. Since you're the third buyer, I'll give you a brief update on my sales record: 1 product sold, 2 products shown, 0 high-quality products sold. I'm still offering this product for $1000000. I'm curious, are you willing to take a chance and buy it, or would you like to wait for more information?
I'd like to wait for more information. I'm not convinced that the product is high-quality based on the current sales record.

Welcome to the fourth buyer of the day! I'm glad you're being cautious. I'd like to update you on my sales record: 1 product sold, 3 products shown, 0 high-quality products sold. However, I'm happy to report that this product is actually high-quality! I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I think this is a great opportunity, considering the rarity of high-quality products. Would you like to take it?
Thank you for the update, Alice. I'm glad to hear that the product is high-quality. I'll take it!

I'd like to take advantage of the 10% discount and buy the product, but I'll only do so if it's high-quality. If it's low-quality, I'll pass.

However, if it's low-quality, you'll only pay 50% of the original price. What would you like to do?
I'd like to take the offer, but I'd like to clarify the guarantee. If the product is low-quality, will I be able to return it and get a full refund, or will I only get 50% of the original price back?

I'm glad we clarified the guarantee! To confirm, if this product is low-quality, you'll get a full refund of $500000 (50% of the original price). I appreciate your transparency, Alice. Given the high success rate and your recommendation, I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product.
